channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens AG -- Polarion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens AG -- Polarion

item.title: CVE-2019-13936|2024-09-16T18:04:24.550Z -- siemens%20ag -- polarion
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in webclient of Siemens AG Polarion could allow an attacker to exploit a persistent XSS vulnerability. This issue affects: Siemens AG Polarion All versions < 19.2.
